abstract: Vows column on wedding of Kristen Titus and Michael Noland-Conlow.
lead_paragraph: After meeting at a wedding, two online specialists kept looking for ways to meet up without the interference of a screen.

headline.main: Digital Experts Head Offline for Love
headline.print_headline: Digital Experts Head Offline for Love
